sentence: Time flies like an arrow, fruit flies like bananas
explanation: Explanation: Fly can mean to move through the air or it can refer to the insect
first_new_sentence: A bird can fly high in the sky.

sentence: Why do people wear sleeveless shirts? they like to express the right to bear arms.

sentence: What did the magician say to the aerial student? i work on a different plane
explanation: Explanation: Plane can mean a flat surface or an aircraft.

sentence: Why couldnt the melons get married? because they cant elope.
